record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="introhelp" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: The help utility enables you to view and edit existing help records as well as to define help records.

detail.detail: To access existing help messages, position the cursor in the field for which you want help and press Ctrl+H (F1 in the web client) or select Help on Field from the Help menu.
To access help on a form or screen, position the cursor in a blank area on the form and press Ctrl+H (F1 in the web client) or select Help on Form from the Help menu.
Service Manager displays the help in a balloon window.
If no help exists for the item accessed, the utility enables you to populate the help record if you have help capability word in your operator record.
